Butcherʼs Cut Steak, Truffle Frites, Béarnaise Sauce 29 $ Dessert Seasonal Cheesecake Whipped Cream 9 $ Chocolate Temptation Cocoa Powder, Whipped Cream 9 $ Happy Hour Specials Available Sundays - Thursdays | 4 PM-6 PM 12 Signature Cocktails 9 Wines By The Glass Chalk Hill ChardonnayIntrinsic Cabernet SauvignonCostaross Prosecco 6 Local Craft Beers Coast HopArt IPACommonhouse White Point LagerFrothy Beard Tides of Galway Irish Red AleHoly City Pluff Mud PorterRevelry Never Sunny New England IPATrop Hop Peachy Wheat AleTrop Hop Tropical IPAWestbrook White Thai Domestic Bottled Beers Michelob Ultra 4Miller High Life 3Miller Lite 4 10 Flatbreads MargheritaSeared Steak* 10 Mac & Cheese Bites Available after 10 PM Boneless Wings Choice of Sauce: Buffalo, Garlic Parm, BBQ Choice of Dip: Bleu Cheese or Ranch 8 Pieces 14 $ 16 Pieces 22 $ Crispy Mac & Cheese Bites Served with Bacon Aioli 15 $ Dip Trio Salsa, Guac & Queso, Served with Tortilla Chips 16 $ Truffle Parmesan Frites 12 $ 20% gratuity is added to parties of 8 or more ROOFTOP HAPPY HOUR Happy Hour, Elevated. Sundays - Thursdays | 4 PM - 6 PM View Specials Location 19 Vendue Range, Charleston, SC 29401 View The Rooftop at on Google Maps Call The Rooftop by phone at (843) 414-2337 Get Directions to The Rooftop via Google Maps 11:30am – 10:00pm SUNDAY - THURSDAY 11:30am – 12:00am FRIDAY & SATURDAY About Awarded “Best Rooftop Bar” By Charleston City Paper since 2007, we offer views for miles… The perfect setting for drinks with a plentiful menu to fuel your good times. A lively gem that satisfies both locals and visitors seven days a week for lunch and dinner. . For groups of 30 to 50, reach out to . No reservations needed or taken [email protected] Contact Sales Gallery Gallery Select a tab to display Gallery Menus Email Signup Close this modal × Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above and apply.
